title: Best Locker Rooms, Linemen in the Draft, Jim McMahon, All Time Most Likeable, and Best Signature Moves
itunes:title: Best Locker Rooms, Linemen in the Draft, Jim McMahon, All Time Most Likeable, and Best Signature Moves
description:
The 'Best of' Edition of The Good Morning Football Podcast begins with Jarvis Landry joining the Saints.  We explore which teams have the best locker rooms in the NFL and Shaun gets excited about the linemen taken in the first round of the Draft.  Super Bowl Champ Jim McMahon drops by to talk about his playing days and celebrating his championship.  Cam Jordan gets picked first as the table debates the most likeable all-time players in the NFL.  We wrap the week with key games in 2022 and the best all-time signature moves.  Hosts include Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, Mike Garafolo, Tom Pelissero, Jane Slater, Michael Robinson and Super Bowl Champion Shaun O'Hara.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
